name: Color Bump (itch) (KeepStaring01)
description:
2022 UNC Collegiate Game Jam!

A small puzzle for memory and attentiveness  :)

CONTROLS:

left mouse button / tapping on the screen;

RULES:

- Click on a cell with the same color as the background;

- Click on the cell that has not been kicked and has the same color as the background;

Leave an assessment and feedback, it will help in the further development of the project  (^_^)
